Package fi.grimripper.loww.tiles

Contains tiles, tile grids, and things that can be placed in tiles.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Block
    A block affects move costs between tiles, unlike an obstacle, which affects the cost of a single tile.
    MovementEvent
    An interface for events triggered when a mobile object moves into or out of a tile.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FilledRowHexGrid
    A hex grid with pre-created hexes in rows.
    FilledSquareGrid
    A rectangular grid of squares with squares for all positions created in advance.
    Hex
    Represents a single hexagon, or hex, in a tile grid.
    Obstacle
    Obstacles are items that can be placed on a tile grid.
    Square
    Represents a single square in a tile grid.
    Terrain
    Terrain for tiles: has a movement cost and height.
    Tile
    This is the abstract super class for squares and hexes.
    TileGrid<T extends Tile>
    Abstract base class for a grid of tiles that are of equal shape and size.
    TileGrid.LineHelper<T extends Tile>
    Contains parameters and methods for selecting tiles along a direct line.

Package fi.grimripper.loww.tiles Description

Contains tiles, tile grids, and things that can be placed in tiles.
